# Trainingsschema

![](images/2024-04-05-trainingsschema.jpg)

## Bo

- Kata's: konchiki, shushi no kon sho, dai
- 5 Comprehensive kumites
- 15 basics (voorheen doorlopende kumite)
- 3 basis kihon: kamai, uke, seme (met en zonder partner)
- 10 basis kumite

## Sai

- Kata: Tsukenshitahaku
- 4 Comprehensive kumites
- Renzoku waza kumite
- 10 basis kumite

## Tonfa

- Kata: Tonfa no hamahiga
- Renzoku waza kumite
- 10 basis kumite

## Kama

- Kata: Tozan
- Renzoku waza kumite 
- 10 basis kumite
